title: Basgiath War College
description: How well do you know the Riders Quadrant?

questions.question: How many quadrants are there at Basgiath?
questions.explanation: Basgiath has four quadrants: Riders, Infantry, Healers, and Scribes.

questions.question: What is the Gauntlet?
questions.explanation: The Gauntlet is a grueling obstacle course that cadets must complete to prove their physical capabilities.

questions.question: Cadets can challenge each other to duels at Basgiath.
questions.explanation: Challenges are allowed and can result in death, making Basgiath extremely dangerous for cadets.

questions.question: What wing is Violet assigned to?
questions.explanation: Violet is assigned to Fourth Wing, led by wingleader Xaden Riorson.

questions.question: What is the main rule about killing at Basgiath?

options.text: No killing outside of challenges or sanctioned combat

questions.explanation: While killing in challenges is permitted, murder outside sanctioned events is punishable.

questions.question: The survival rate for first-year cadets in the Riders Quadrant is high.
questions.explanation: Many first-year cadets die from the parapet, Threshing, challenges, or training exercises.

questions.question: What class teaches combat techniques to riders?
questions.explanation: Cadets take hand-to-hand combat classes to prepare them for physical confrontations.

questions.question: Who is the commandant of Basgiath?
questions.explanation: Commandant Panchek is the leader of Basgiath War College.
